fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Budget, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Banking and financial services, European Neighbourhood Policy
inter_groups:
Seas, rivers, islands and coastal areas  
Social economy, social economy enterprises, social entrepreneurship and third sector
eu_initiatives: We follow actively European urban policy, cohesion policy, research and innovation policy, transport policy, maritime policy, environment policy and energy policy, new budget consultations, migration
organisation_name: Regional Office of Westpomeranian Region in Brussels (Rue montoyer 31 /10)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
goals__remit:
The main tasks of our office in Brussels are 
 
to promote the region and its interests towards the EU institutions. 
to gather and provide the latest information on the preparation of EU legislation, EU funding programmes, events, co-operation, and networking opportunities. 
to develop contacts with other European cities, regions and European networks. 
to give full support to regional actors in their EU related activities.  
to provide information about the region. 
We follow actively European urban policy, cohesion policy, research and innovation policy, transport policy, maritime policy, environment policy and energy policy.
